skills.data0: This is a skill that is installed on Project Alice.
skills.data1: If the skill has any user settings available, this button will appear. Click it to configure your skill!
skills.data2: You can stop any skill that isn't required for Alice to run using this button.
skills.data3: You can also reload a skill that isn't critical for Alice.
skills.data4: You disabled skill auto update? In that case you'll still be able to update your skill using this button! Please note that it is only showing if an update is available
skills.data5: Not using this skill anymore? Well, you can delete it here! Keep in mind you can't delete Alice required skills!
skills.data6:
This shows the status of the skill.

Green: All good
Yellow: The skill was disabled
Red: The skill failed starting.
skills.data7: Don't know what to say to use this skill? Check here!
skills.data8: Get some useful info about the skill, like, who made it, its actual version etc.
skills.data9: If the skill developer included some instructions on how to use this skill, you will find them here.
skills.data10: Need more skills? This is where you can get them!

skill.demoDesc: This is a UI tour demo skill

devMode.listExplain: Enter a comma separated list, example 'foo, bar, baz'

titles.confirmSkillDeletion: Are you sure you want to delete this skill?
titles.enterNewLocationName: Please enter the new name for this location

bodies.clickToAddLocation: And click OK. Click on your floorplan where you want to add that location to create a default sized location. You can also click and drag to create a location of different size and shape!
bodies.locationNameOrSynonymAlreadyExist: There's already a location with this name or synonym existing.
bodies.noDevices: There are currently no device types available for addition. Install some more skills for additional devices!
bodies.enterNewIcon:
Please enter the new font awesome icon, including the prefix.
You can find them on: Font Awesome
